name: Spike Balls
description:
Spike Balls V1.4 (first public release):

Spike Balls explores dexterity mechanics by requiring you to tap the incoming floating spike balls which will otherwise hit your character. As you progress, the spike balls will come in at a greater speed and the fun background music will accelerate to show you this! You get three lives which are demonstrated by rotation of the platform you are standing on. Once it's rotated three degrees, you are done and must start again.

This is a fun game to have on your Android which will certainly entertain you when you are bored. Enjoy!

Controls

Tap once - destroys red spike balls/picks up health points

Tap twice - destroy black spike balls
